abstract: The country’s space agency said that the craft’s components, and those of the rover it would soon release, had “deployed in place normally.”
title: China Releases First Photos From Its Mars Lander

fullImage.caption: Coverage of the Mars landing on a screen in Beijing on Saturday. The first images from the lander were released on Wednesday.

largeThumb.caption: Coverage of the Mars landing on a screen in Beijing on Saturday. The first images from the lander were released on Wednesday.

abstract: Jewish extremists have formed more than 100 new groups on the Facebook-owned encrypted messaging app in recent days to target attacks.
title: Mob Violence Against Palestinians in Israel Is Fueled by Groups on WhatsApp

fullImage.caption: An Israeli man at a restaurant that was attacked last week in the city of Bat Yam.

abstract: Following its spinoff of WarnerMedia, AT&T is back to primarily being a wireless company, with all of the challenges that entails.
byLine: By Edmund Lee and Lauren Hirsch
title: After Media Detour, AT&T Confronts Old Problems

abstract: The legislation has drawn bipartisan support amid the coronavirus pandemic as Democrats and Republicans have become increasingly concerned about Beijing’s supply chain dominance.
title: Senate Weighs Investing $120 Billion in Science to Counter China

fullImage.caption: A semiconductor factory in Nantong, China, in March. The country is the host of a critical supply chains including semiconductors.

abstract: A new report shows that a surprisingly small number of big companies and banks are behind the manufacturing and financing of much of the world’s single-use plastic.
byLine: By Michael Corkery and Somini Sengupta
title: Here Is Who’s Behind the Global Surge in Single-Use Plastic

fullImage.caption: Collecting plastic at a landfill on Sulawesi in Indonesia. Half the world’s single-use plastic is made by 20 big companies, researchers said.

largeThumb.caption: Collecting plastic at a landfill on Sulawesi in Indonesia. Half the world’s single-use plastic is made by 20 big companies, researchers said.
